subtitleNullable: Responses from a public survey of students
descriptionNullable:
[![Made by Statistry](https://statistry.bsoyka.me/img/badge.png)](https://statistry.bsoyka.me/?utm_source=dataset_description&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=educational_stress_due_to_the_coronavirus_pandemic)

The survey collecting this information is still open for responses [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfAClggsWPHw1w6qqxpmOB8tRj_TxqFARq-w4qp9aIsawGYqA/viewform).

### Context

I just made this public survey because I want someone to be able to do something fun or insightful with the data that's been gathered. [You can fill it out too!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfAClggsWPHw1w6qqxpmOB8tRj_TxqFARq-w4qp9aIsawGYqA/viewform)


### Content

Each row represents a response to the survey. A few things have been done to sanitize the raw responses:
- Column names and options have been renamed to make them easier to work with without much loss of meaning.
- Responses from non-students have been removed.
- Responses with ages greater than or equal to 22 have been removed.

Take a look at the column description for each column to see what exactly it represents.


### Acknowledgements

This dataset wouldn't exist without the help of others. I'd like to thank the following people for their contributions:
- Every student who responded to the survey with valid responses
- [@radcliff on GitHub](https://github.com/radcliff) for providing the [list of countries and abbreviations](https://gist.github.com/radcliff/f09c0f88344a7fcef373) used in the survey and dataset
- [Giovanna de Vincenzo](https://www.kaggle.com/giodev11) for providing the [list of US states](https://www.kaggle.com/giodev11/usstates-dataset) used in the survey and dataset
- [Simon Migaj](https://unsplash.com/@simonmigaj) for providing the [image](https://unsplash.com/photos/Yui5vfKHuzs) used for the survey and this dataset
title: COVID-19's Impact on Educational Stress
